channel.title: No-Ip Help! (READ)
channel.description: Okay so i was using no-ip to host my server name. but after about 2 weeks of working the Ip will not work. And i know it is not my port port forewarding because my friend can connect using my Ip address. Can anyone help me or tell me what to do to fix this? :confused:

item.title: No-Ip Help! (READ)
item.dc:creator: @alanpwns alanpwns
item.description:
@alanpwns wrote:

Everything is checked. and when i click update it says no update needed. and when i says Url/Ip my ip address it in there but i cant use the no-ip to connect. only can use my Ip address.

Read full topic

item.title: No-Ip Help! (READ)
item.dc:creator: @meiscooldude meiscooldude
item.description:
@meiscooldude wrote:

make sure you update your no-ip ‘ip’ to point to your current computer’s ip, if its not static (most likely not), it will change making your no-ip fail…

Read full topic

item.title: No-Ip Help! (READ)
item.dc:creator: @airborne airborne
item.description:
@airborne wrote:

2 weeks? did you check your no-ip? your ip might start to expire, and they will ask you to renew the ip.

Read full topic
